name: foodcesi
description: school project to mimic Uber eats

scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend/foodcesi && npm run lint" "cd frontend/ra-app && npm run lint"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend/foodcesi && npm run dev" "cd frontend/ra-app && npm run dev"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend/foodcesi && npm install" "cd frontend/ra-app && npm install"
